equipment.layer_switch.underwear: Press <yellow><key:key.drop></yellow> to switch to cosmetic layer
equipment.layer_switch.cosmetic: Press <yellow><key:key.drop></yellow> to switch to armor layer
equipment.gloves.hot_item_hold: You can't hold hot items without gloves
equipment.gloves.lava_bucket_fill: You can't fill a bucket with lava without gloves
equipment.gloves.water_bucket_fill: You shouldn't fill a bucket with water in cold biomes without gloves
